name: 李老师不是你老师

Many domestic bonds of Vanke have fallen, among which the price of "21 Ke 06" has fallen to 57 yuan.
The restructuring goal of Country Garden's overseas bonds: reduce debt by US$11.6 billion and extend the maturity to 11.5 years.

This caused netizens to mock: "Only one person (Wang Xing) came back from a room, that's really powerful" 
"When will the other people trapped in Myanmar come back?"

In an interview at the U.S. Embassy in Beijing, U.S. Ambassador to China Burns claimed that nearly 400 Chinese companies provided dual-use products to Russia.
He also pointed out that China provided 90% of the microelectronics for Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

After several days of entering the Pucheng Vocational Education Center, all roads in Pucheng are still closed under martial law.

content: Netizen contributions Today's Weibo trends: More than 153 media outlets posted on Weibo to show their concern for the wildfires in the United States, which is more than the total number of media outlets that paid attention to the Tibet earthquake and the Spring Festival travel rush.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 13, in Zhengzhou, Henan, a man came to the street office to do some work. The slogan at the entrance read: "Listen to the people's demands, respond to the people's concerns, and guide the people's emotions." However, the man said, "Ordinary people can't take the elevator, and ordinary people can't enter the glass door of the office. It's stricter than the detention center."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In a report on January 13, economist Hong Hao said: "Young people should not worry too much about losses. The most terrible thing is that you have learned nothing after the losses," which caused ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Zelensky released a video of the Ukrainian army interrogating North Korean soldiers who were recently captured by the Ukrainian army.
A captured North Korean soldier said: We didn't know we were fighting with the Ukrainian army. The commander told us that this was training. On January 3, we launched an attack and all our comrades died. I hid in the bunker and was discovered on January 5. The North Korean soldier expressed his hope to stay in Ukraine.
Another captured soldier said he wanted to return to North Korea.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A woman who claimed she was deceived by human traffickers to Myawaddy, Myanmar, to engage in fraud, has been posting messages for help on social media since the end of November last year. The woman said she has been trapped for 140 days and her family has been contacting the embassy and other relevant departments since last year, but several months have passed and no case has been filed yet. She has nowhere to turn to, and she was still posting messages on Weibo for help last night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After China implemented visa-free travel for South Korea, many "Shanghai men" and "Shanghai women" drove luxury cars on the streets, saying that they wanted to give these Korean tourists a hard time and let them broaden their horizons. Some supercar teams even implemented a "three-shift" mode.
This incident sparked heated discussions among Korean netizens: "This idea itself is very low" "China is so poor that even the panda Fubao can't eat, and they are reluctant to do medical examinations when their children are sick"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hangzhou Aijia Confinement Center absconded with the money, and the mothers who tried to defend their rights were passed around by the public security, industrial and commercial bureau, and petition bureau. During this period, many mothers received calls from the community and police station, and were asked not to appeal to higher authorities. On January 13, the mothers came to the Hangzhou Citizen Center to defend their rights and seek justice. One of the mothers was forcibly carried away by four or five security personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hello @weremeow @JupiterExchange @aeyakovenko and @solana, we are curious if Solana’s largest DEX aggregator, JUPITER, operates under political censorship in its token review process, similar to OKX, when reviewing tokens.

DEXs should embody the freedom and decentralized spirit of blockchain. Does ...
fullContent:
Hello @weremeow @JupiterExchange @aeyakovenko and @solana, we are curious if Solana’s largest DEX aggregator, JUPITER, operates under political censorship in its token review process, similar to OKX, when reviewing tokens.

DEXs should embody the freedom and decentralized spirit of blockchain. Does Solana allow DEXs on its network to discriminate against tokens for political reasons?

Context: OKX, a crypto exchange with significant Chinese capital and close ties to the CCP, removed and banned $LI from its wallets just two days after launch, citing false pretenses. The real reason? $LI advocates for freedom of the press and speech—values the Chinese government considers a threat.

Meanwhile, the $LI team has applied for verification on @JupiterExchange several times since its launch. Despite meeting all requirements, 25 days later, there’s still no approval.

As for @JupiterExchange, the $LI team applied for verification on the first day of its launch. Despite meeting all requirements, it has now been 25 days without approval.

This raises serious concerns. Is Solana’s largest DEX aggregator complicit in such political censorship? We are seeking a clear answer.

#Solana #JupiterDEX #FreedomOfSpeech #BlockchainEthics

@MeteoraAG @Kamino_Finance @JupiterExchange @solana @MarinadeFinance @SonicSVM @PythNetwork
@metaplex @phantom @SolanaFndn @orca_so @RaydiumProtocol @pumpdotfun

I want to be the first man to open a single page in the family tree" "A soldier is lost in Japan"

content: On January 12, a Zhihu user posted: (Myanmar Telecom Fraud) If it is not resolved, will we have the nerve to commemorate the Nanjing Massacre next year? Ignoring the people who are being massacred now, and commemorating the people of the Republic of China who died 88 years ago, isn't it telling the world that I don't care about the lives of the people, and commemorating this is just to hate Japan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 12, Deep Blue Finance: A Russian V-lister angrily accused Chinese auto brands of poor after-sales service. She said, "They have no intention of maintaining their brand image, their job is to sell cars to us." After Western brands withdrew from the Russian market, ordinary people had no choice but to buy Chinese cars, and customers bought our new cars without warranty or after-sales service.

name: 李老师不是你老师

"In addition to the first batch of captured North Korean soldiers, there will undoubtedly be more. It is only a matter of time before our army captures others. It is an indisputable fact that the Russian army relies on North Korea's military assistance"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 13, Hefei, Anhui. It was revealed online that the boss of Tongcheng Tongmei Children's Programming Institution absconded with the money, the store was locked and empty, the teachers' salaries were in arrears, and the parents who prepaid the fees could not get a refund. The teachers and parents worked together to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Chinese fashion cross-border e-commerce SHEIN has risen rapidly but has been controversial. The BBC revealed today that workers in the sewing room of SHEIN's Guangzhou supply chain work about 75 hours a week, violating Chinese labor laws.
Reporters visited 10 factories known as "SHEIN Village" and interviewed more than 20 workers. Most workers said that they only had one day off a month and their working hours were usually from 8 am to 10 pm. Even after 10 pm, the sewing machines and the people bending over them did not stop because more fabrics were shipped in trucks, and the trucks were full.
A worker told the BBC: "If there are 31 days in a month, I will work 31 days"
A female worker from Jiangxi said that wages are calculated by piece, and one T-shirt can earn RMB 1 to 2. Usually, they work 10 to 12 hours a day, and make about 12 pieces per hour.
The report believes that SHEIN...
fullContent:
中国时尚跨境电商 SHEIN 快速崛起却争议不断，BBC今天披露，SHEIN位于广州供应链的车衣间工人每周工作约75小时，违反中国劳动法。
 记者参观了被称为「SHEIN村」的10间工厂并访问20多名工人，大部分工人表示，每月仅休息一天，上班时间通常是上午8点至晚上10点。即使过了晚上10点，缝纫机和弯腰在缝纫机前的人们仍没有停止，因为更多的布料装在卡车里运来，卡车里装得满满的。
 一名工人告诉BBC：“如果一个月有31天，我就会工作31天”
 一名来自江西的女工说，工资以件数计算，1件T-Shirt可赚人民币1到2元，通常每天工作10到12小时，每小时大约制成12件。
 报导认为，SHEIN成功秘诀在于价格实惠以及库存充足，并指该品牌在英国平均价格在8英镑（约人民币71元）或以下，还时不时打折促销。
 SHEIN的商品极具价格竞争力，但却屡生争议，包括产品安全
 2022年绿色和平德国办公室团队发起研究调查，从SHEIN在欧洲多个国家网站上购买了数十件男装、女装、童装和鞋子，并将样品交由独立研究机构分析。结果显示。受检商品中的15%含有超出欧盟标准的有害化学物质，其中32%的有害化学物质含量达到令人担忧的程度。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 10 (Release) The families of the trapped people in Myanmar called on the country to rescue their trapped compatriots: "Their lives should not be forgotten, and their sufferings deserve attention. We hope that the relevant departments can pay attention to the fraud industry in Myanmar and request the country to crack down on the industry to rescue the people and let them return to the embrace of the motherland."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The U.S. Embassy in China condemned Maduro's illegal attempt to seize power in Venezuela.
Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, who has been in power for nearly 12 years, has plunged the country into a more serious economic and social crisis. Now, despite six months of election disputes, calls from the international community for him to step down, and the U.S. government raising his bounty to 25 million, he still declared his inauguration for a third term on Friday (January 10).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 13 (Released) Quanzhou, Fujian. Someone set up a stall in Yuanyangchi Park in Shishi to give away breakfast for charity. 
It was reported online that a man wearing a hat cursed the charity stall owner because he arrived late and did not eat fried dough sticks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger said: "In fact, Koreans are shocked that there are so many luxury cars in a place where the minimum wage is only 2,690 yuan." "What's even more shocking is that low-income people are actually proud of other people's luxury cars."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 12, the Chess and Card Sports Management Center of the General Administration of Sports reported the investigation of the "recording scandal" of chess: 41 violators were punished, including Zhao Xinxin, Wang Yang, Zheng Weitong and three others who were banned for life. The three people who were banned for life were all national chess champions.
In addition, the reporter found that the national chess champions in the past ten years have almost been "annihilated".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The judge overdrew 14,000 yuan from his credit card, was arrested by the police, and was sentenced to 13 months in prison. The public security, procuratorial and judicial organs themselves are powerless to resist the evil forces.
On December 25 last year, Chen Jianxiong, a former judge of the Potou District People's Court of Zhanjiang City, was arrested by the police for "credit card fraud" for overdrawing his credit card by 14,000 yuan, and was later sentenced to 1 year and 1 month in prison.
It is reported that in 2006, when Chen Jianxiong was in charge of an execution case, he offended the then president Lu Moujin because he did not follow his illegal greeting.
Chen Jianxiong's defense lawyer Shen Yuan said: Bank card overdraft is a very normal thing, and Chen Jianxiong did not have the subjective intention to evade repayment. As a judge, he has a stable income and there is no need to evade a mere 10,000 yuan debt.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In addition to Wu Jing's wife Xie Nan, the Douyin comment section of actor Xu Zheng was also attacked recently because he filmed the movie "Lost in Thailand" 13 years ago. Netizens called Xu Zheng a shareholder of Myawaddy in the comment section. 
At present, the relevant comments have been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At about 4pm on January 13, a scaffolding at Kai Tak Hospital in Hong Kong suddenly collapsed, trapping workers on the scaffolding five meters above the ground. It was reported that a total of 11 people were injured. As of 7pm, one man and three women were in critical condition, one man was seriously injured, and three were in stable condition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Financial columnist Guo Shiliang: The Shanghai Composite Index can no longer represent the Chinese stock market. It is recommended to re-establish an A-share constituent index to replace the Shanghai Composite Index in order to enhance the international image of the Chinese stock market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is said online that Hu Xijin liquidated his holdings and delisted. The article mentioned: I failed to really consider the risks behind the stock market and the limitations of the system; the Chinese stock market is not as healthy as advertised; some companies' performance announcements and financial data may be false; the Chinese stock market does not have the basic conditions for a healthy market.
This evening, Hu Xijin responded: The screenshot was an impersonation, Lao Hu did not liquidate his holdings, and will not do so in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 12 (Released) It was reported online that a teacher from Hunan University reported that Peng Zhubin, the former dean of the School of Journalism and Communication of Hunan University, had been stealing and leaking national postgraduate entrance examination questions for many years, accepting bribes, and was suspected of embezzling and transferring state funds, infringing on intellectual property rights, and violating teacher ethics.
